#summary xml-rpc con cherrypy
#labels cherrypy,xml-rpc

= XML-RPC =

*Servidor*
{{{
import sys, os.path
import cherrypy

class Root: 
    pass

class XmlRpc(cherrypy._cptools.XMLRPCController):
     def suma(self, a, b):
         return a + b
     suma.exposed = True

root = Root()
root.xmlrpc = XmlRpc()

cherrypy.tree.mount(root, config={'/': {
     'request.dispatch': cherrypy.dispatch.XMLRPCDispatcher(),
             }
         }
      )
conf = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), 'ejemplos.conf')

cherrypy.quickstart(root, config=conf)
}}}

*ejemplos.conf*
{{{
[global]
server.socket_host = "127.0.0.1"
server.socket_port = 8080
server.thread_pool = 10
}}}

*Cliente*
{{{
import xmlrpclib

rpc = xmlrpclib.ServerProxy("http://localhost:8080/xmlrpc")

print rpc.suma(2,3)
}}}
